page.title: 10Our School Day _ Wednesday
page.content: {8.50 a.m.}We start school with registration and give in our dinner tickets. Mrs Carter, our teacher, tells the groups what they will be doing, it is usually Maths. {10.10 a.m.}We go to Assembly in the Hall, we sing hymns and say prayers. {10.30 a.m.}Break _ in the winter on the playground, in the summer on the field. {10.45 a.m.}Handwriting and then poetry {11.20 a.m.}Back to the Hall _ singing. {12.00 midday}Dinner _ over the road in the new building, then play for 30 min {1.00 p.m.}Games : in the winter _ boys have football, girls have netball; in the summer _rounders,cricket,stoolball {2.30 p.m.}Table bingo, dictionary games or reading. {3.00 p.m.}Storytime. {3.20 p.m.}Hometime.
